name: 4 - 9 - 3.9 Text Categorization- Generative Probabilistic Models (00-31-18).srt

name: 4 - 9 - 3.9 Text Categorization- Generative Probabilistic Models (00-31-18).srt

column6: we're going to talk about discriminative approaches. _

name: 4 - 9 - 3.9 Text Categorization- Generative Probabilistic Models (00-31-18).srt
text: So the problem of text categorization

name: 4 - 9 - 3.9 Text Categorization- Generative Probabilistic Models (00-31-18).srt

name: 4 - 9 - 3.9 Text Categorization- Generative Probabilistic Models (00-31-18).srt

name: 4 - 9 - 3.9 Text Categorization- Generative Probabilistic Models (00-31-18).srt

name: 4 - 9 - 3.9 Text Categorization- Generative Probabilistic Models (00-31-18).srt

name: 4 - 9 - 3.9 Text Categorization- Generative Probabilistic Models (00-31-18).srt

name: 4 - 9 - 3.9 Text Categorization- Generative Probabilistic Models (00-31-18).srt

name: 4 - 9 - 3.9 Text Categorization- Generative Probabilistic Models (00-31-18).srt

name: 4 - 9 - 3.9 Text Categorization- Generative Probabilistic Models (00-31-18).srt

name: 4 - 9 - 3.9 Text Categorization- Generative Probabilistic Models (00-31-18).srt
